channel.title: SSH on Static Manual
channel.description: Recent content in SSH on Static Manual

item.title: SSH Key Setup
item.description: Find the server key fingerprint 1 ssh-keygen -l -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ecdsa_key.pub Generate key pair on the client 1 ssh-keygen -t ecdsa -C "Client_XX_Server_XX_20010101" -f ./ssh_XX2XX_ecdsa_key Setup /etc/ssh/sshd_config on the server 1 mkdir ~/.ssh 1 touch ~/.ssh/authorized_keys 1 chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys Copy pub key to the server 1 scp -P <port> C:\Users\<USERNAME>\.ssh\ssh_XX2XX_ecdsa_key.pub <USERNAME>@<IP ADDR>:~/.ssh/ssh_XX2XX_ecdsa_key.pub 1 cat ~/.ssh/ssh_XX2XX_ecdsa_key.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
